item.description:
Just can't resist this dance movie, which was reviewed in the Globe today.

This ridiculous, over-the-top spoof of dance movies was produced by the members of the Upright Citizens Brigade. Its plot is pretty much what you’d expect: a spoiled rich girl yearns to be a dancer and finds freedom in the underground dance world but, when tensions rise between two rival crews and a dance-off is imminent, she finds herself caught in the middle. The delivery, however, is totally, hilariously, wrong.

And the director will be present.

If you RSVP yes, let me know if you would like to meet ahead of time to get a bite to eat.  I'm partial to Charlie's burgers, but I know that I'm a group of one.  Would be happy to compromise and pick another place.

 

The movie is 90 minutes long, so it's possible I'll have enough energy to go for a movie discussion after at 9:30.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be outside the box office at 7:45
item.name: Can't resist a Dance Movie at the Brattle: Freak Dance (90 minutes)
